1376: Auesoete was born in Uterechse straet in 1376.
1396: Auesoete moved to Marcktgang.A.2 after marriage.
Moved in with husband Hardenbernus's family after marriage.
Got married to Hardenbernus at age 21 in 1396.
1379: Lost mother at the age of 3 in childbirth.
1382: Lost sibling Segherarden in 1382 when Segherarden was 13.
Lost sibling Myrthel in 1382 when Myrthel was 4.
1391: Lost sibling Alretieren in 1391 when Alretieren was 21.
1397: Gave birth to Stoethoute in 1397 at age 21.
1398: Gave birth to Sipper in 1398 at age 22.
1399: Gave birth to Hako in 1399 at age 23.
